performances.description: Epic bust out in Memphis, the home of Al Green. Sorry, Talking Heads did not write the song.  Firm believer this was the best run in 1995.
Fun pittsburgh show in the pouring rain, not the total let down many summer 1995 shows were, this was a rare treat
Nice rare cover of the classic Al Green tune, also covered by the Talking Heads. Perfect Bobby cover choice.
Rare late era take on the al green classic
